00067 class dbList { 
00068   public:
00069     enum NodeType { 
00070         nInteger,
00071         nBool,
00072         nReal,
00073         nString,
00074         nTuple,
00075         nAutoinc,
00076         nIdentifier
00077     };
00078 
00079     dbList* next;
00080     int     type;
00081     union { 
00082         bool  bval;
00083         db_int8  ival;
00084         real8 fval;
00085         char* sval;
00086         struct { 
00087             int     nComponents;
00088             dbList* components;
00089         } aggregate;
00090     };
00091 
00092     ~dbList() { 
00093         if (type == nTuple) {
00094             dbList* list = aggregate.components;
00095             while (list != NULL) { 
00096                 dbList* tail = list->next;
00097                 delete list;
00098                 list = tail;
00099             }
00100         } else if (type == nString || type == nIdentifier) {
00101             delete[] sval;
00102         }
00103     }
00104 
00105     dbList(int type) { 
00106         this->type = type;
00107         next = NULL; 
00108     }
00109 };
00110 
00111 
00112 struct tableField { 
00113     char* name;
00114     char* refTableName;
00115     char* inverseRefName;
00116     int   type;
00117     
00118     tableField() { name = refTableName = inverseRefName = NULL; }
00119     ~tableField() { delete[] name; delete[] refTableName; delete[] inverseRefName; }
00120 };
00121 
00122 class dbUpdateElement { 
00123   public:
00124     dbUpdateElement*   next;
00125     dbFieldDescriptor* field;
00126     dbExprNode*        value;
00127     char*              strValue;
00128 
00129     dbUpdateElement() { 
00130         next = NULL;
00131         strValue = NULL;
00132         value = NULL;
00133     }
00134     ~dbUpdateElement() { 
00135         delete[] strValue;
00136         delete value;
00137     }
00138 };
